Posts.Content: Another option is cellulose-based fibers. I've taking a local version of this refined cellulose product before, and I find it alright. It doesn't really cause gas or cramping. Psyllium also gives me cramps. http://www.unifiber.com/productinfo.html http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20090502225806AA
